imdb.plot outline: Mari Winsor brings her unique and elegant style to this series to help you achieve that lean, sculpted Pilates body. Winsor's detailed instructions make this program easy to follow no matter your skill level. Modified positioning is included throughout for beginners. Unroll your mat, take off your shoes and treat your body to a total transformation.
imdb.title: Gaiam: Mari Winsor Slimming Pilates
plot: Mari Winsor brings her unique and elegant style to this series to help you achieve that lean, sculpted Pilates body. Winsor's detailed instructions make this program easy to follow no matter your skill level. Modified positioning is included throughout for beginners. Unroll your mat, take off your shoes and treat your body to a total transformation.

Mari Winsor brings her unique and elegant style to this series to help you achieve that lean, sculpted Pilates body. Winsors detailed instructions make this program easy to follow no matter your skill level. Modified positioning is included throughout for beginners.
